recipesJson.name: Raspberry Cheesecake
recipesJson.author: RdaJunkie
recipesJson.description: Recipe inspiration came from a subway raspberry  Cheesecake cookie. Fa cookie and inw biscuit give you a nice buttery crunch for the crust. Obviously ny cheesecake is where the cheesecake comes in nice and fluffy. Strawberry ripe and sweet raspberry play so nice together. They pick each other up in all the ways necessary to give you a sweet bright raspberry flavor. 4:2 ratio is perfect. Mix and enjoy ðŸ˜Š

reviews.text: The cheesecake base tastes spot on to me.  I am not getting any raspberry flavor though.  Still a good vape
Very tasty! Maybe a touch more NYC? I think I will try that next time i mix it up.
This is absolutely amazing! I love how the strawberry ripe pairs up with the sweet strawberry, and I really like what you did with the biscuit, cookie, and New York cheesecake. Great job!
